name: NCPR–NorthCountryPublicRadio
0:
”Alexa, open NCPR”
”Alexa, play NCPR”
”Alexa, ask NCPR to browse programs”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. c. p. r.
des:
Play your favorite NCPR news programs, music shows and podcasts, including Story of the Day, The Eight O’Clock Hour, Natural Selections, The Beat Authority, The Radio Bob Show, and lots more. 

“Alexa, ask NCPR to play…”
 
“…the Eight O’Clock Hour”
“…Story of the Day”
“…Natural Selections”
“…The Dean’s List”
“…Trail Mix”
“…The Radio Bob Show”
“…String Fever”
“…The Beat Authority”
“…The Thread”
“...The Folk Show”

NCPR is donation-supported public radio for the North Country. Our broadcast serves communities in the Adirondacks, St. Lawrence Valley, Champlain Valley, Thousand Islands, Jefferson County, Lewis County and the Tug Hill Plateau, western Vermont and the Canada border. Every broadcast day is full with regional and NPR news, eclectic music, entertainment and arts programming.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
